title: Social Digest: Lachlan Morton Opens up on Mental Health Struggles at Unbound, Pedersen’s Purple Reign, ‘Wout is God’ at Giro d’Italia
content:
Humanity behind the racing. A meaningful year for many riders at the Giro d'Italia and Unbound Gravel.

Read the full article at Social Digest: Lachlan Morton Opens up on Mental Health Struggles at Unbound, Pedersen’s Purple Reign, ‘Wout is God’ at Giro d’Italia on Velo.
author: Julia Dowd
